briefdescription.para: Instantiate a MultipatchSplineEvaluator2D.

parameterdescription.para: An operator to locate a coordinate. The mapping stored in this class has to be invertible.
The extrapolation rules.

memberdef.definition: KOKKOS_FUNCTION double MultipatchSplineEvaluator2D< ExecSpace, MemorySpace, BSpline1OnPatch, BSpline2OnPatch, Grid1OnPatch, Grid2OnPatch, ExtrapolationRule, ValuesOnPatch, PatchLocator, Patches >::operator()
memberdef.name: operator()

briefdescription.para: Evaluate the 2D splines (described by their spline coefficients) at a given coordinate.

detaileddescription.para: The spline coefficients represent a 2D spline function defined on a B-splines (basis splines). They can be obtained via various methods, such as using a SplineBuilder2D or MultipatchSplineBuilder2D. The coordinate is defined on one patch. But it can be physically located on another patch.

parameterdescription.para: Patch type where the given coordinate is stored. It does not mean that the coordinate is physically located on the patch.
The coordinate where the spline is evaluated.
A MultipatchType of DField storing the 2D spline coefficients.

simplesect.para: The value of the spline at the desired coordinate on the right patch.

memberdef.definition: void MultipatchSplineEvaluator2D< ExecSpace, MemorySpace, BSpline1OnPatch, BSpline2OnPatch, Grid1OnPatch, Grid2OnPatch, ExtrapolationRule, ValuesOnPatch, PatchLocator, Patches >::operator()
memberdef.argsstring: (MultipatchValues const &patches_values, MultipatchCoordField const &patches_coords, MultipatchSplineCoeff const &patches_splines) const
memberdef.name: operator()

briefdescription.para: Evaluate 2D splines (described by their spline coefficients) on meshes.

parameterdescription.para: A MultipatchType of DField to store the values of the splines at the given coordinates.
A MultipatchType of Field of Coordinate storing the coordinates of the meshes.
A MultipatchType of DField storing the 2D spline coefficients.

simplesect.para: The derivative cannot be computed outside of the domain. The coordinate do not still have to be defined on the right patch.

parameterdescription.para: Patch type where the given coordinate is stored. It does not mean that the coordinate is physically located on the patch.
The coordinate where the spline is differentiated.
A MultipatchType of DField storing the 2D spline coefficients.

simplesect.para: The derivative of the spline at the desired coordinate on the right patch.

A MultipatchType of DField storing the 2D spline coefficients.

memberdef.definition: KOKKOS_INLINE_FUNCTION double MultipatchSplineEvaluator2D< ExecSpace, MemorySpace, BSpline1OnPatch, BSpline2OnPatch, Grid1OnPatch, Grid2OnPatch, ExtrapolationRule, ValuesOnPatch, PatchLocator, Patches >::eval_no_bc
memberdef.argsstring: (CoordOnPatch< Patch > const &coord_eval, DConstField< spline_idx_range_type< Patch >, memory_space, Layout > const &spline_coef) const
memberdef.name: eval_no_bc

param.type: DConstField< spline_idx_range_type< Patch >, memory_space, Layout > const &

briefdescription.para: Evaluate the given spline at the given coordinate without carrying of the boundary conditions.
A class to evaluate all the splines of all the patches at once.

detaileddescription.para: This class computes the evaluations of the splines defined on each patch at given coordinates. The class does not need to instantiate in advance individual spline evaluators. The coordinates are stored in fields on each patch. On a given storing patch, we do not enforce that a coordinate is physically located on this storing patch. These fields of coordinates can be the result of characteristics equations solving.

This function is useful to avoid calling all the spline evaluators individually, especially in a multipatch geometry with several patches. It also manages to evaluate the right spline at a coordinate physically located on another patch than the storing patch.
Additionally, methods to compute the first derivatives and cross-derivatives are implemented.

simplesect.para: This operator does not work on batched domain.

parameterdescription.para: The space (CPU/GPU) where the calculations are carried out.
The space (CPU/GPU) where the coefficients and values are stored.
A type alias which provides the first BSpline type along which the splines are built template on the Patch.
A type alias which provides the second BSpline type along which the splines are built template on the Patch.
A type alias which provides the first Grid type along which the interpolation points of the splines are found template on the Patch.
A type alias which provides the second Grid type along which the interpolation points of the splines are found template on the Patch.
The extrapolation rule type for outside of the global domain.
A Field type storing the evaluated values of the splines. Template on the Patch.
A operator that finds the patch where a given coordinate is physically located.
A variadic template of all the patches.
